definition: both ends/both parties to a deal
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
suffix for nouns
lit. twice every three days (idiom); practically every day/frequently
erhua variant of 兩頭|两头[liang3 tou2]
to burn the candle at both ends (idiom)/to labor under a double burden

sentences.english: Tie to the post of Unconcern the goats of Vice and Virtue.
sentences.chinese: 把惡習與美德兩頭山羊綁在漫不經心的柱子上。

sentences.english: You count them again and learn you have two cows.
sentences.chinese: 你再數一次，結果變成兩頭牛。

sentences.english: Because you might be the only two mammoths left on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你們倆個可能是地球上唯一的兩頭長毛象。

sentences.english: You cannot burn the candle at both ends.
sentences.chinese: 蠟燭不能兩頭點，一精一力不可過分耗。

sentences.english: Every day I see the two-headed monster of tax and red tape.
sentences.chinese: 每天都得與稅和紅章這兩頭怪獸打交道。

sentences.english: They fastened the two gold chains to the rings at the corners of the breastpiece
sentences.chinese: 把那兩條擰成的金鍊子，穿過胸牌兩頭的環子。

sentences.english: The second, list "eat deeply two" as the most important.
sentences.chinese: 第二，把“喫透兩頭”列爲重中之重。

sentences.english: Which of the two cows that you keep produces more milk?
sentences.chinese: 你養的兩頭奶牛中哪頭牛產奶更多？

sentences.english: The sick child every two or three days, I often run to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 孩子三天兩頭的生病，我就隔三差五的往醫院裏跑。

sentences.english: One engine at each end of the body of the plane provided power.
sentences.chinese: 在機體的兩頭，各有一個引擎，提供飛機的動力。

sentences.english: Many people have been seeing these two Narwhals every single day.
sentences.chinese: 有一頭被衝到岸上的死鯨，它是兩頭獨角鯨的媽媽。

sentences.english: Two mules well-laden with packs were trudging along.
sentences.chinese: 兩頭騾子馱着包裹長途跋涉。

sentences.english: Red bean exports two narrow gorge, the hinterland of the open, the shape of gourds .
sentences.chinese: 紅豆峽兩頭出口狹窄，腹地開闊，形似葫蘆。
這可是一個兩頭不能討好的難題。

sentences.english: A pair of oxen, yoked together was used in the plough.
sentences.chinese: 兩頭牛被軛套在一起用於耕犁。

sentences.english: If there is a double-dip, Obama is almost certainly toast.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以兩頭沾光，奧巴馬將毫無疑問炙手可熱。
